title: She Belongs To Me - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Cold Love Interests   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Pregnancy   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Unreliable Narrator   Wealthy Characters
author: 妲婴
description:
We’ve been married for three years, and I didn’t like her at first. She is so cute, only cold and hard to approach on the surface. In fact, she is delicate and sincere in her heart, even with a little bit of a cunning personality. She will step on anything to make me happy, so in my eyes, I must get her no matter how.

Let her belong to me, completely.>
